short_description: hamilton hilands e&s llc. is an insurance agent, carrier or broker based in bedford, texas, united states.
long_description: our mission at hamilton hilands is to provide agencies with an unparalleled experience with the excess and surplus lines insurance needs. with the ever changing conditions of the insurance world, we provide our broker community with a stable, service oriented, local model that can address and protect your specialty risk needs. backed by some of the most knowledgeable and well respected underwriters, the hamilton hilands team is dedicated to providing agents with excellent service, innovative markets and aggressive pricing that address the complex e&s market. as an independently owned agency, we pride ourselves on our commitment to our agents and our joint success.
